name: PeriGen
overview: E&C Medical Intelligence, Inc. provides risk management solutions and consulting services in the United States. It offers Intelligent Patient Record for Obstetrics (IPROB), a technology based system that provides a mutli-disciplinary documentation and clinical decision support system, and feedback and guidance to doctors and nurses to support them with practice performance to reduce error in obstetrics (OB) and enhance performance to outcomes for mothers and babies, and doctors and nurses. The companyâ€™s IPROB also provides OB risk exposure solutions, such as fetal monitoring interpretation/response, VBAC/TOLAC, shoulder dystocia, teamwork communication care coordination, instrumented deliveries and forceps, oxytocin use, neonatal resuscitation, and unanticipated event disclosure solutions. In addition, it offers risk management consultation services, such as quality and risk assessment for client’s needs and risk profile; system customization to address and correct the benchmarked informational and quality gaps and issues; system’s clinical behavior follow up; best practice and care improvements monitoring; and implementation and support services. The company serves healthcare professionals, medical centers, and hospitals. It markets its products and services through direct sales force. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Princeton, New Jersey.
